title: Strasbourg vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 20
description: Strasbourg have lost 53% of their Ligue 1 matches against Paris SG in their history, more than against any other team in the competition. Strasbourg have lost just 29% of their home Ligue 1 matches against Paris SG since their return to the top flight in 2017-18, the lowest percentage of defeats for any team hosting PSG in the competition over that period.

title: Elche vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 22 - Mini Match
description: All matches from the 2025–26 La Liga season are available live and exclusive only on beIN. La Liga, Spains premier football competition, runs from 15 August 2025 until 24 May 2026. Barcelona are the defending champions, having won their 28th title the previous season.

title: Manchester United vs Fulham - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 24
description: Manchester United have lost just one of their last 20 Premier League games against Fulham, going down 2-1 at Old Trafford in February 2024. Following a 1-1 draw at Craven Cottage in August, Fulham are looking to avoid defeat in both Premier League matches with Manchester United for the first time since 2003-04.

title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 24
description: Tottenham have completed the Premier League double over Manchester City nine times so far, more than they have any other opponent. Meanwhile, only Chelsea have done so more against the Citizens. Man City have won their last two away league games against Spurs, last winning three in a row between February 1973 and August 1974.

title: Strasbourg vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 20
description: Strasbourg have lost 53% of their Ligue 1 matches against Paris SG in their history, more than against any other team in the competition. title: Leeds United vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 24 - Mini Match
description: Wolves have lost each of their last three Premier League home games against Bournemouth, having won their first two against them in the competition. Bournemouth are looking to complete a league double over Wolves for the third time, previously doing so in 1985-86 and 2014-15.

title: Liverpool vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 24 - Mini Match
description: Liverpool are unbeaten in their last 18 Premier League games against Newcastle, since a 2-0 away loss in December 2015. Newcastle have failed to win any of their last 29 Premier League away games against Liverpool, their joint-longest winless run against an opponent in their league history.

description: Senegal were crowned champions of Africa for the second time in their history after edging hosts Morocco 1–0 after extra time in a gripping Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) final in Rabat.

description: AO26 Mini Matches (26 minutes) delivers daily highlights of the most important match of the day from the Australian Open 2026 main draw at Melbourne Park. description: The tournament’s flagship center court (14,820 seats) with a retractable roof, staging the biggest day sessions (from 11:00am local) and night sessions (from 7:00pm local). title: Al Ahli vs Qatar Club - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W14
description: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

title: Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
description: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025.Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha.All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and AfricaMatch for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

title: Paris vs Chambery - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
description: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.
